sentence: The  withdrawal  comes  as  Israeli  officials  announced  they  would  pull  thousands  of  troops  from  the  territory  in  preparation  for  a  new  phase  in  the  war,  which  began  on  Oct.  7  when  Hamas  militants  broke  through  the  border  and  killed  some  1,200  Israelis  in  towns  and  military  bases  nearby.
